desc: Our talented crew works with an array of metals (steel, stainless, aluminum, brass, bronze, copper, pewter, zinc) and we’ll cut, form, forge, weld, roll, grain, patina, and top-coat to meet your needs. Custom Metals is a family-owned company, in business since 1980.

layout.text:
Every project has its own solution.
From streamlined cable rails to old-world wrought iron; a low maintenance aluminum stairway or the ever-changing surface of pewter or zinc; a rustic steel fireplace... a burnished copper stove hood... a glass rail that doesn't obstruct your view, or a sturdy gate that gives you privacy...
